  • API

API

Main module

This module provides bot with data structures and allows you to set up your token and enable the bot.

PATH/Environment token setter:

set_token.set_token()

Asks for your VK bot’s token in order to write it to PATH/Environment of your system

User class with info:

class user.User(vk_id)

Bases: object

This class saves user’s ids, states and last attachment

active_attachment = None
id = None
state = 0

Constants and data saving:

async constants.load_users()

Loads users from ‘users.pickle’ file

Returns

dictionary {id:User}

async constants.save_users(data)

Saves users to ‘users.pickle’ file

Returns

None

Bot startup:

main.create_parser()

Creates parser for setting bot’s token via a cmd argument

Blueprints module

This module provides bot with the main logic for interacting with users.

Greeting logic:

async greeting.hello_message(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Saves user to users_info dictionary Greets user and calls a keyboard for them

Parameters

message – “привет<!>”, “Привет<!>”, “начать<!>”, “Начать<!>”

Returns

None

Data acquiring logic:

async get_data.attachment_document(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Saves user to users_info dictionary

If user’s state is ‘1’ and user sent a .png file:

Gets photo as a document and text in the same message for hiding in the photo

Encodes text in .png photo and sends it back

Changes user’s state to 0

If user’s state is ‘2’ and user sent a .png file:

Gets photo as a document

Decodes text from .png photo and sends it back

Changes user’s state to 0

Tells the document type, size and url to the user

Parameters

message – Document message from user

Returns

None

async get_data.audio_message(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Saves user to users_info dictionary Tells the url to .mp3 and .ogg to the user

Parameters

message – Audio message from user

Returns

None

async get_data.unique_message(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Sees if a received message is a forwarded message if the message contains audio messages then it gives a link to download it

Parameters

message – Any message

Returns

None

Encryption logic:

async encrypt.encrypt_audio_message(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Saves user to users_info dictionary Changes user state to 3 Allows user to send photo as a document and write text to hide in the photo in the next message

Parameters

message – “Зашифровать в голосовом сообщении”

Returns

None

async encrypt.encrypt_photo(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Saves user to users_info dictionary Changes user state to 1 Allows user to send photo as a document and write text to hide in the photo in the next message

Parameters

message – “Зашифровать в фото”

Returns

None

Decryption logic:

async decrypt.decrypt_photo(message: vkbottle.bot.Message)

Saves user to users_info dictionary Changes user state to 2 Pickles users_info dictionary

Parameters

message – “Расшифровать фото”

Returns

None

Steganography module

This module provides bot with the encryption/decryption algorithms.

Picture logic:

class stegano.png.TextHider(stop_indicator='$STOP$')

Bases: object

This class provides encode and decode methods text information. Works with PNG images.

decode(filename: str) → str

Method decodes text from given image which is encoded with “encode” method. Returns encoded message or None if image isn’t encoded. filename: encoded image

encode(secret: str, filename: str, out='encoded.png') → None

Method encodes text into given image using LSB. secret: text information to hide filename: image in which we want to encode secret out: name of encoded image

Sound module

This module provides bot with the additional algorithms for working with music files.

soundTasks.convert.convert_mp3_to_wav(source, output)

Converts .mp3 file to .wav file

Parameters

  • source (str) – .mp3 file name

  • output (str) – .wav file name

Returns

None
